summary: Implemented a new Gallery section with responsive grid, thumbnail-click lightbox modal (using existing Dialog UI), and added a Gallery link to the header navigation with smooth scrolling. One requirement about adding the static image asset itself is not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image (image-1.jpg) as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets (or subfolder) and ensure it loads in production.
missing_requirements.reason: The Gallery section references '/assets/image-1.jpg', but the diff summary does not show the actual static asset file being added under frontend/public/assets (binary assets may be omitted from the LLM-readable diff, so this cannot be confirmed).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a “Gallery” quick link in the site footer with smooth-scroll behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 only requests adding “Gallery” to the site navigation (header desktop and mobile menus). Footer navigation changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an image title overlay (“Professional Logistics Services”) on hover in the gallery thumbnails.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires a responsive grid and a lightbox preview interaction, but does not mention per-image titles/overlays.
